pullrequest.title: Model submission for X4 sensor config 2

content.raw: @{557058:14b7fd50-d65a-47a8-825c-fa89681d07bd} - I’m still having trouble adding you as a user on my repository.  I am by no means an expert at mercurial or bitbucket, so maybe I’m going about this wrong, but I tried going into my fork and then into Settings->User and Group Access.  Then, it asks me to enter a user account or email address.  acschang doesn’t work.  It says “Unable to add that user.  To invite a new member, enter an email address.”  If you send me an email to this account \(realdealneil at gmail\) this I will try to add you using your email address.  Other option would be to post the file changes you made and I’ll commit and add to the pull request.  I’ll look into modifying the laser model on Monday when I’m back in the office.
content.html: @Arthur Schang - I’m still having trouble adding you as a user on my repository. I am by no means an expert at mercurial or bitbucket, so maybe I’m going about this wrong, but I tried going into my fork and then into Settings->User and Group Access. Then, it asks me to enter a user account or email address. acschang doesn’t work. It says “Unable to add that user. To invite a new member, enter an email address.” If you send me an email to this account (realdealneil at gmail) this I will try to add you using your email address. Other option would be to post the file changes you made and I’ll commit and add to the pull request. I’ll look into modifying the laser model on Monday when I’m back in the office.
